name: OGNL Injection Scanner
description: Detects Object-Graph Navigation Language (OGNL) injection vulnerabilities in Java applications, particularly Apache Struts. Can lead to Remote Code Execution.
author: Dominator Team
cwe_name: Improper Neutralization of Special Elements used in an Expression Language Statement
remediation: Update Apache Struts to the latest version. Disable dynamic method invocation. Use allowlisting for allowed methods. Implement proper input validation.
